ratings.comment: Not a natural born teacher. He made lectures mandatory even thought they made no sense, confusing us more. His teaching skills are noticeably bad, slow and boring yet still confusing.
Not a natural born teacher. He expected us to attend lectures even though they made no sense, confusing us all even more. His teaching skills are pretty bad, slow and boring yet still confusing.

I took Math 222 with Andrew over the summer. Andrew wrote 300 pages of course notes (with fun pictures) for this class which provided students with an alternative point of view distinct from the textbook. I highly recommend Andrew to any student that really wants to dive into the material and understand math on a deep and intuitive level.
This is a Math 222 in summer. Andrew is definitely not awful. He answers my questions in a way that is very helpful to me. And he answers everyone's questions as long as they go to him.

Krenz is a TA, he is horrible, I don't recommend. His lectures were confusing, grading was inconsistent. He refuses to explain in another way, and refuses to answer questions. If you get Krenz, switch classes immediately.
